content.name: Andrew Millen
content.title: Sr. Product Designer
content.intro: Hello! I’m a hybrid UI/UX designer with a background in copywriting and front-end development. I’ve done a little bit of everything, but my passion is building precise yet flexible design systems for digital products. Recently, I’ve also been exploring augmented reality interfaces.
content.cta: Shoot me an email or visit me on Dribbble, Codepen, or my blog.
